author: Perez Hilton
title: Rihanna REALLY Brought Her Own Flask To The Grammys! Fill In The Blank!
text:
Adele Pays Tribute To George Michael At The... by videosuploaded 
Adele is nothing if not perfection. And sometimes that means being a fucking perfectionist. 
The Hello singer paid tribute to George Michael on the 2017 Grammys stage with a performance of Fastlove , turning the upbeat track into a dirge. 
But the sad, slow version didn't get off to the best start. So Adele said FUCK IT -- literally, she totally swore on live TV -- and stopped the song to go again. 
And she absolutely SLAYED it. 
By the end, the mistake had been forgotten as everyone -- including Adele herself -- was in tears. 
Ch-ch-check out the amazing performance (above) and relive the original (below)!
